biotools.summary: DATAMAN is a global database of nitrous oxide and ammonia emission factors for excreta deposited by livestock and land-applied manure. The overall aim of DATAMAN is to provide access to the most up-to-date knowledge on managing manure GHG emissions.

bioschemas.name: DATAMAN
